content: Is it me, or is Zulip a bit slow these days?
maybe explain what is slow? overall experience? navigation?
Everything was slow and I started getting 500 errors right after asking.

Zulip is an Electron app, and those are known to often consume unacceptable amounts of RAM. If you have other Electron applications running in the background, you may consider shutting them down if performance is a real issue.
No, it was a transient server-side issue. And I'm using the browser version, not the Electron app anyway (I didn't even know there was one).
FWIW for me the zulip app can take several seconds to load a single thread, even if there were only one or two comments. So the speed has been frustrating me too
